forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 4pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. South wind 1 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 10pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. North northeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the sky reveals a tapestry of muted grays, hinting at the quiet dance between clouds and the brief, fleeting glimmers of sunshine. The air carries a hint of moisture, and the forecast suggests the possibility of rain making an entrance later in the evening, casting a soft urgency on the day's pursuits. The temperature hovers around a brisk 55 degrees, encouraging a thoughtful selection of attire—think layers, a cozy sweater perhaps, and an umbrella ready at hand.

The visibility appears subdued but not entirely obscured; the edges of the city remain distinctly outlined against the backdrop of a cloud-laden sky. The marine layer does its best to drape the Golden Gate softly, creating a serene atmosphere that invites strolls along the waterfront or a leisurely visit to one of the local cafes, where the allure of a warm drink might just be the perfect antidote to the chill. Should you wander, take note of the artistic rhythm of the day—perhaps a quiet gallery or bookstore would offer solace amidst the urban cadence, while the impending rain offers a reminder to pause and savor the intimate moments that only a cloudy day can inspire.
